concept.description: Sets labels :Assert and :AssertJ for AssertJ assert methods.
concept.cypher: MATCH (assertType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(assertMethod) WHERE assertType.fqn =~ 'org\\.assertj\\.core\\.api\\..*Assertions.*' AND ( assertMethod.signature =~ '.* assert.*' OR assertMethod.signature =~ '.* fail.*' ) SET assertMethod:AssertJ:Assert RETURN assertMethod ORDER BY assertMethod.signature
